FAQ Section with Collapsible Questions.Layout: Centered, columnar layout with a text introduction followed by a list of questions and answers.
FAQ Section with Collapsible Questions.Design: Organized and user-friendly. Each question is clickable, revealing the answer below it.

Key Elements.Section Title: Centered, bold, and slightly larger heading indicating the FAQ nature.
Key Elements.Introductory Text: Short paragraph providing context or additional information, centered and easily readable.
Key Elements.Accordion Style Questions: Each question can be clicked to reveal or hide the answer, enhancing user interaction.
Key Elements.Icons for Interaction: Arrows indicating the collapsible nature, enhancing visual cues and user experience.

FAQ Section with Collapsible Questions.Use Cases: Ideal for product pages, service websites, or any platform where users might have common questions or need detailed information in an organized manner.
